Room.Name: Monument Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Monument Avenue, just east of the Allakaren Circle.
Room.LongDescription: You can see the Allakaren Circle to the west and the interesting Tree of Life that the Circle surrounds. The tree has been in that same place as far as people can remember into the past, and was rumored to be the sacred tree of Allakaren himself. Allakaren is the pharaoh of the ancient lands that would later (much, much later) become Oceancrest. A monument to his great existance still stands on the southeastern corner of the town.
